DOC.brief_title: Medication Adherence Therapy Opioid Abusing Pain Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Project Pain Stage I behavioral therapy development project aim develop pilot test novel intervention patient chronic non-malignant pain experience difficulty manage prescribed opioids . The goal study : ( 1 ) develop intervention training material ; ( 2 ) develop therapist adherence competence scale ; ( 3 ) train therapist deliver intervention per treatment protocol ; ( 4 ) pilot intervention ass feasibility , acceptability promise . The goal intervention : ( 1 ) improve adherence prescribed opioids ; ( 2 ) decrease severity patient ' pain ; ( 3 ) improve patient ' function quality life .
